page.title: 07EVENTS IN COOKSTOWN
page.content: The following news items appeared in the Mid_Ulster Mail of 20/6?85 Community tensions as a "monster loyalist parade" threatens to march through a Catholic housing estate. Spate of burglaries in Cookstown. Cookstown Wildlife Trust visits the Copeland Bird Ovservatory. Cookstown Police Chief awarded MBE. South Derry R.U.C. reservist murdered. Article on Tullylagan Garden Fete. Cookstown Garden Club outing to Glenveagh National Park in County Donegal. Problems of finding additional car_parking space in Cookstown. Northern Ireland goalkeeper Pat Jennings in Cookstown to promote Youth Week.
